Title: Cross-Site Scripting (XSS) in TYPO3 component CSS styled content
Description: Failing to properly encode user input, the CSS styled content component is susceptible to Cross-Site Scripting, allowing authenticated editors to inject arbitrary HTML or JavaScript.
AffectedVersions: All versions starting from 6.2.0 before 6.2.19, all versions starting from 7.6.0 before 7.6.4
NotImpacted: All versions before 6.2.0, all versions starting from 6.2.19 before 7.6.0, all versions starting from 7.6.4
